name: Gregory Amasa 10 Hydration Pack - Women's
description: Concentrate on the trail, not your load. The women's-specific suspension keeps the pack still and prevents bouncing. The hipbelt is easily repositioned to accommodate your riding style or body position, especially on hills. Includes a quick-drying Gregory 3D Hydro reservoir with magnetic bite valve that attaches to the magnet on the sternum strap.210-denier ripstop nylon with a reinforced, abrasion resistant 420-denier base.Women's-specific Shift RS suspension maximizes stability and provides no-bounce performance.Adjustable hipbelt moves up or down to compensate for body position, ride style and trail grade.Matrix ventilated foam in the backpanel and harness provide airflow and evaporative cooling.Magnetic sternum strap attachment allows you to buckle it one-handed.Pockets and sleeves carry spare tubes, energy bars, patch kits and both a tire and a shock pump.Scratch-proof sunglasses attachment on shoulder strapHydration sleeve and easy to use SpeedClip mounting system.For loads up to 7kg.
